The 50% promotion is valid for all of our packages and Operating Systems with the following promo code: CORGI50

**Basic VPS**

750MB Dedicated RAM

30GB RAID 10 HDD

2 CPU Cores

<del>100Mbit</del> 1Gbit Connectivity

1TB Bandwidth

Console and power options as standard.

$7 / Month Order here: [http:///www.corgitech.com](http:///www.corgitech.com)

**Operating Systems :** Linux (most flavours), Windows 2003, 2008R2, 2012, BSD.

VSphere access available on request.

**Locations:** London , Amsterdam (Low Stock), New York, Los Angeles, Denver , Phoenix (Low Stock), Dallas, Miami (Low Stock)

**Test Files and IP's available on our website :** [http:///www.corgitech.com](http:///www.corgitech.com)

**Terms:**

We don't allow seedboxes, email marketing, heavy video encoding, SPAM of any kind. Adult content is allowed. IRC is allowed at certain locations, contact us directly for info. Offer is available to existing clients as long as existing services are not cancelled.
